Hospital equipment distribution with Relaso Hospitech

Tailored specifically for empowering healthcare equipment distributors with seamless lead management, automated workflows, and real-time insights.

Try for free   Watch Video

Used daily by 500+ brilliant users

Relaso for Hospitech offers you multiple features

RELASO CRM designed specifically for healthcare equipment suppliers and distributors, offers a comprehensive, industry-focused solution that addresses the unique challenges of the HospiTech sector. By combining advanced CRM features with deep industry insights, RELASO empowers businesses to manage complex sales cycles, customer relationships, and inventory, while driving operational efficiency and growth

Key features include:

Lead & Opportunity Management

Track, manage, and nurture leads effortlessly, helping you convert opportunities into successful deals with organized pipelines.

Customer Relationship Management

Build and maintain strong customer relationships with a centralized system for tracking interactions, preferences, and support history.

Inventory and Order Management

Efficiently manage your inventory and orders, keeping stock levels optimized and ensuring timely order fulfillment.

Quotation & Contract Management

Simplify the creation, approval, and tracking of quotes and contracts to streamline your sales and legal workflows.

After Sales Service & Support Management

Provide exceptional post-sales support, managing service requests and tracking resolutions to improve customer satisfaction.

Compliance & Regulatory Tracking

Ensure regulatory compliance with automated tracking and documentation, reducing risks and maintaining standards.

Analytics & Customizable Reporting

Gain insights into your business performance with powerful analytics and customizable reports that support data-driven decisions.

Easy Integration with ERP/Financial Systems

Seamlessly integrate with ERP and financial systems to unify data and streamline workflows across departments.
